app.name: PCAL
app.dataPrivacy: Your data stays on this device

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Manage your children and activity logs
dashboard.selectChildMessage: Select a child from the list on the left or create a new profile to manage activity logs.
dashboard.chooseDate: Choose a date to log activities
dashboard.dateHelperText: You can log activities for today or any past date

welcome.title: Welcome to PCAL!
welcome.subtitle: Track parent-child activities for Head Start programs
welcome.step1Description: Start by creating a profile with the child's name, center, and teacher information.
welcome.step2Description: Record what activities you did together, which goals you worked on, and how long you spent.
welcome.step3Description: When you're done, export a PDF report to share with your Head Start program.
welcome.feature2Description: Everything is saved on your device only
welcome.feature3Description: Simple forms and helpful prompts guide you through

entryList.noEntriesHint: Create a new entry to start logging activities.

dailyEntryForm.selectEntry: Please select or create a daily entry
dailyEntryForm.deleteActivityMessage: Are you sure you want to remove "{{activity}}"? This action cannot be undone.
dailyEntryForm.noActivitiesHint: Use the form to add your first activity.
dailyEntryForm.addNotesTooltip: Describe what you did in your own words. This is optional if you already selected activities above.
dailyEntryForm.notesPlaceholder: Example: We read a book about animals and talked about what sounds they make...
dailyEntryForm.daySummaryTooltip: This creates a written summary of all your activities for the day. Great for reports and documentation!
dailyEntryForm.summaryTip: Tip: Click "Write Summary" to automatically create a professional description of today's activities.
dailyEntryForm.summaryUnavailable: Summary could not be generated. Please check your connection and try again.

childManager.title: Manage Children
childManager.subtitle: View and remove child profiles
childManager.noChildrenHint: Add children from the dashboard to see them here.
childManager.warningMessage: Deleting a child will also delete all their activity logs. This action cannot be undone.
childManager.deleteChildMessage: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}} and all their activity logs? This action cannot be undone.

goalManager.title: Goal Management
goalManager.subtitle: Customize developmental goals and activities
goalManager.deleteGoalMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this goal? This action cannot be undone.
goalManager.resetAllGoalsMessage: Are you sure you want to reset all goals to the default settings? This action cannot be undone.
goalManager.noGoalsHint: Add your first developmental goal using the form.

goalForm.goalCodeInUse: Goal code {{code}} is already in use.
goalForm.descriptionPlaceholder: e.g., Child will manage actions and behavior...
goalForm.fixErrors: Please fix the errors before saving.

goalSelector.noGoals: No goals configured. Please add goals in Goals & Setup.
goalSelector.whatDidYouWorkOnTooltip: Pick the developmental goal you focused on during this activity. Each goal has different learning activities.
goalSelector.whatActivitiesTooltip: Check all the activities you did together. You can select more than one!

signaturePad.signInstructions: Sign with your finger or mouse in the box below

pdfExport.title: Export to PDF
pdfExport.selectEntries: Select entries to include in PDF:
pdfExport.selectAtLeastOne: Select at least one entry to generate a PDF

toast.activitySaveFailed: Failed to save activity. Please try again.
toast.summaryFailed: Failed to generate summary. Please try again.

pdfPreview.warningAlreadySent: Warning: Some entries were already sent
pdfPreview.alreadySentCount: {{sent}} of {{total}} entries have already been emailed.
pdfPreview.canSendAgain: You can still send them again if needed.
pdfPreview.emailInstructions: This will download the PDF and open your email client. You'll need to attach the PDF before sending.
pdfPreview.markAsSent: Mark {{count, plural, one {this entry} other {these entries}}} as sent
pdfPreview.markAsSentDescription: {{count, plural, one {This entry} other {These entries}}} will be tagged with a "Sent" badge and timestamp to help you avoid sending duplicates.

dataManager.title: Data Management
dataManager.subtitle: Export and import your PCAL data
dataManager.exportDescription: Download a backup file containing all your children, activity logs, goals, and journal events. Keep this file safe to restore your data later.
dataManager.exportError: Failed to export data. Please try again.
dataManager.importDescription: Restore your data from a previously exported backup file.
dataManager.importModeLabel: How would you like to import?
dataManager.mergeModeDescription: Add new records from the backup while keeping your current data. Duplicate records will be skipped.
dataManager.replaceModeDescription: Delete all current data and replace it with the backup. Use this for a complete restore.
dataManager.replaceWarning: Warning: This will permanently delete all your current data and replace it with the backup file contents.
dataManager.importError: Failed to import data. Please try again.
dataManager.confirmMergeMessage: This will add new records from the backup file while keeping your existing data. Proceed?
dataManager.confirmReplaceMessage: This will permanently delete ALL your current data and replace it with the backup file. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure?
